title: Exploring Changes in Terminology in Educational Technology: Reinterpreting the Meanings of Learning, Design, and Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Working professionals explore historical changes in educational technology and investigate methods for integrating learning-design-technology approaches in primary education.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the evolution of terminology in educational technology according to major concepts across eras
Learners can analyze the interrelationships among learning, design, and technology and propose implementation plans for primary education
Learners can evaluate the identity formation process in educational technology using qualitative research methods

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
